item.title: 越南語筆記
item.description: Consonant Romanisation IPA Example p p b ɓ ph f v v m m t t th tʰ đ ɗ x, s s d, gi, r z n n l l ch, tr c nh ɲ c, k, q k kh x g, gh ɣ ng, ngh ŋ Vowel Romanisation IPA Example i, y i ê e e ɛ iê, ia ie ư ɨ â ə ơ ə: ă a a a: ươ, ưa ɨə u u ô o o ɔ uô, ua uo oa wa: oe wɛ Coda Romanisation IPA Example p p t t c, ch k m m n n ng, nh ŋ o, u w i, y j Tone
